pages.text: 15|32|Allahe ka’le, ‘he ibalicha! Tomara ki ha’la, tumi kiya chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’la’
15|33|si ka’le, ‘(he allaha!) Tumi gandhayukta bokara sukana tim tim sabda karaa ka’labaraniya matira paraa yi manuha srsti karaicha ma'i taka chajadaha nakarao’.
15|34|Te'om ka’le, ‘tente ta'i iyara paraa ola'i ya, karana niscaya ta'i abhisapta
15|35|arau niscaya pratidana dirasa laike tora oparata thakila abhisampata.
15|36|Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Teneha’le moka arakasa diya se'i dinalaike, yidina sihamtaka punaraujjiraita karaa ha’ba’.
15|37|Te'om ka’le, ‘ya, niscaya toka arakasa diya ha’la
15|38|‘sunirdista samaya ahara dina paryanta’.

15|39|Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Tumi ye moka bipathagami karaila se'i babe arasye ma'i prthiraita papakarmasamuhaka manuhara ocarata sobhaniya karai tulima arau arasye ami sihamtara ata'ike bipathagami karaima
15|40|‘kintu sihamtara majata tomara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae’.
15|41|Allahe ka’le, ‘e'itorae mora ocaralai ahara sarala patha’.
15|42|‘Niscaya mora bandasakalara oparata tomara kono ksamata na'i, kintu pathabhrastasakalara bahirae yisakale tomaka anusarana karaiba’
15|43|‘niscaya jahannama sihamta sakalorae pratisrauta sthana’
15|44|‘se'itora satakhana duraara ache, pratyeka duraaraerae praraesa karaibalai (cayatanara anusaraisakalara babe) nirdista ansa ache’.
15|45|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau prasraranasamuhara majata.
15|46|Te'omlokaka koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke santi arau niraapattara saite iyata praraesa karaa’.
15|47|Arau ami te'omlokara antarara paraa hinsa bidbesa amtaraa'i dima; te'omloke bhatrra darae parasparae ijane sijanara sanmukhara asanata arasthana karaiba
15|48|tata te'omlokaka arasade (klantiye) sparsa nakaraiba arau tara paraa te'omlokaka bahiskrta'o karaa naha’ba.
15|49|Mora bandasakalaka jana'i diya ye, niscaya ma'i parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
15|50|arau niscaya mora sastiye'i haiche yantranadayaka sasti
15|51|arau tumi sihamtaka jana'i diya, ibraahimara atithisakalara katha
